attributes.comment:
To Whom It May Concern,

My husband and I are currently in the process of adopting a child from the PR
China. Costs associated with the adoption process can be quite high. One such
cost is related to the filing of the I-600A to obtain the I-171H. Due to the longer
wait time between Dossier submission and referrals, families are having to refile
for the I-171H by resubmitting their I-600A and redoing fingerprints. As is, this is
very expensive. Raising the cost of filing (and biometric costs) would just add to
the financial stress.

Please reconsider raising the costs associated with filing for the I-600A. Having to
refile is already a stressful situation, please do not add to that by increasing the
fees.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,
Nicole Van Note Gower
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Nicole Van Note Gower
